name: idiom-generator
description: it's not just pigs that are happy

scripts.deploy: zip -FSr ./lambda.zip ./node_modules/ ./index.js ./idiom.js twitter.js ./keys.json ./nouns.json ./qualifiers.json ./conditions.json && aws --debug lambda update-function-code --function-name idiom-tweeter --zip-file fileb://./lambda.zip && rm ./lambda.zip

author: ronanyeah <ronan_mccabe@hotmail.com>
